text: Toto Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi ni ulia owalonga likulu nende eshialo khutsinyanga tsisasaba. Mana naleng’ana khu shisala shishie shioluyali. Afimbanga eshilo khushitere eshilondangakhwo lwangu. Nende eliuba nende omwesi, nende tsing’ining’ini tsikhoyelungwa khukhuchama khukhwe. Koo manye mbu okhulonga nende obunyali nobubwe, Nyasaye Niwoluyali Omulesi webiloonje
